sentences.sContent: When he condescended to speak, he contradicted himself three or four times in the space of half an hour.
sentences.sCn: 当他屈尊讲话时，半小时内有三四次前后矛盾。

remMethod.val: con + de + scend(爬) → 向下爬 → 俯就

words.tran: 谦逊的；故意屈尊的；有优越感的

trans.tranOther: to do something in a way that shows you think it is below your social or professional position – used to show disapproval
